thread.section_title: Hotel le Chat Noir - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday trip January 2016
thread.title_full: Birthday trip January 2016 - Review of Hotel le Chat Noir, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Wally F
title: Birthday trip January 2016
text:
Despite the cold, the hotel was an interesting place to stay. Sandwiched between a strip/adult club and the historic Le Chat Noir restaurant.
i knew the neighbor hood would be interesting as it was near the base of Sacre Couer and Mommatre
Room Tip: get a room that overlooks the Pigalle area See more room tips
